title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in the StyledText widget with word wrap enabled, the redraws are inefficient and slow.
EB: The redraws during text change with word wrap should be optimized to improve performance.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText widget.
2. Change the text in the widget.
3. Observe the inefficient and slow redraws that occur.

To verify the optimization, add the following line to the performPaint method ofStyledText class:
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
